Press Release
New Evonik Products at PCHI in Guangzhou

front.div:
• Collagen boosting bioactive peptide
• Novel silicone based oil-in-water emulsifier
• Premium silicone conditioning agent
• Natural beta-glucan biopolymer for skin protection
• Innovative EO free concentrate for cosmetic wet wipes
• Multifunctional technology for cosmetic skin care wipes

The business unit Consumer Specialties of Evonik will be
presenting its portfolio of Personal Care products at this
year's PCHI in Guangzhou, China, from February 24 through
26, 2009 at booth number B 04, introducing some
innovative products and technologies for skin and hair care
and giving a presentation about "novel plant extracts and a
biodegradable polypeptide from natural sources for
achieving outstanding radiance and skin performance".
The new products are:
